description: Try our easy to follow Endive & Fennel Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Orange,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Endive & Fennel Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 tbs moro extra virgin olive oil
1 bunch baby endive, leaves separated, washed, dried
1 small red onion, halved, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: For the dressing, whisk ingredients together in a large bowl and season.

Add the orange segments, fennel, endive, onion, cucumber and olives. Toss gently to combine. Serve. Note: This salad is great served with slowcooked lamb shoulder, barbecued lamb leg or roast chicken.
